item.title: Hyderabad bus crashes in Gadwal, four critically injured
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: An Andhra Pradesh State Road Transport Corporation (APSRTC) bus lost control and crashed into a roadside ditch on an early Thursday morning, February 19, near Telanganaâ€™s Jogulamba Gadwal district.
There were 30 passengers on board. The injured have been shifted to the Kurnool Government General Hospital. Four of them are critically injured.
The bus was heading to Ananthapur from Hyderabad....]]>
